sessions.title: Sessions

workflow_guide.title: How does it work?
workflow_guide.intro: Follow these 4 steps to turn your consultation into documents ready to send to the patient.
workflow_guide.step1_detail: Click "Start Transcribing" to record directly from the microphone, or use the arrow next to it to select "Upload Audio" and upload a previously recorded file. The transcription will be automatically generated and appear in the text box below.
workflow_guide.step1_tip: The recording must be at least 1 minute long. You can pause and resume at any time.
workflow_guide.step2_detail: Every session must be linked to a patient. You can search for an existing patient or create a new one directly here.
workflow_guide.step2_search: Type the name in the search field. Results appear automatically as you type. Click on the patient to select them.
workflow_guide.step2_create: Click "+ Create new patient". The field switches to creation mode. Enter the full name and click "Save". The patient is created and automatically selected.
workflow_guide.step3_detail: The session is the record that connects the transcription to the patient. It serves as the basis for creating quotes and clinical reports afterwards.
workflow_guide.step3_button_desc: Becomes enabled when you have a transcription and a selected patient. Click to create the session. Once created, the other buttons are unlocked.
workflow_guide.step4_detail: With the session created, you can generate documents using templates:
workflow_guide.step4_template_desc: Opens a screen where you choose a template (document model). The AI automatically fills in the template using information from the transcription. You can create quotes, clinical notes, and prevention plans.
workflow_guide.draft_desc: Your work is automatically saved in the browser. If you accidentally close the page, your transcription and selected patient may be recovered when you return. When you create a session, the data is saved to the session and cleared from this screen. Use the reset button (↺) to clear everything and start fresh.

placeholders.title: e.g., Dental Consultation Summary
placeholders.description: Optional description to help identify this template

guide.title: Template Creation Guide
guide.subtitle: How to create dynamic templates for clinical documentation
guide.placeholders_description: Wrapped in square brackets. These will be filled with information from the session dialogue, clinical notes, or contextual notes.
guide.instructions_description: Wrapped in round brackets. These guide the AI on how to behave when information is missing. Instructions will not appear in the final output.
guide.variables_description: Wrapped in double dollar signs. These are filled with database values when the quote/report is created.
guide.click_to_see_variables: Click here to see the available variables
guide.example_content:
Dear $patient.fullName$, your appointment on $session.created_at$ was [summarize findings].

Dr. $me.fullName$ from $me.clinic$ recommends [treatment plan]. (Only include if mentioned in transcript)

Next appointment: [next appointment details]

ai_agent.menu_description: Configure AI Agent behavior and system prompts
ai_agent.page_description: Configure the AI Agent's behavior and initial system message
ai_agent.system_message_description: This message defines how the AI Agent should behave and respond. It's the first message sent in every conversation to establish context and guidelines.
ai_agent.transcription_required: The $transcription$ variable is required to ensure the consultation transcription is sent to the agent.
ai_agent.variables_explanation: Variables are text wrapped in dollar signs (e.g., $name$) that are automatically replaced with real values from the database when the document is generated.

transcription.quota_exceeded_message: You have reached your monthly limit of {{limit}} minutes. Cannot start new transcription until next month. Contact your account manager to increase your limit.
transcription.quota_warning_message: You have used {{used}} of {{limit}} minutes ({{percent}}% of your monthly quota). Consider managing your usage or increasing your limit.

welcome.title: Welcome to TQ!
welcome.description: TQ helps you transcribe consultations, manage patients, and create professional quotes and clinical reports. Let's learn how it works!
welcome.ready_description: The system is 100% functional with default settings. This tour shows how to customize TQ to match your style.
welcome.feature5: Share documents with custom landing pages

transcription.title: Audio Transcription
transcription.description: Record your consultations or upload audio files, and TQ will automatically transcribe them into text.
transcription.step1_desc: Click "Start Transcribing" or upload an existing audio file.
transcription.step2_desc: The audio is automatically converted to text.
transcription.step3_desc: Link the transcription to a patient to create a session.

templates.title: Document Templates
templates.description: Templates are pre-made document structures that AI fills in automatically using your transcription data.
templates.guide_hint: A complete guide is available on the template create/edit page.

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: When you combine a transcription with a template, TQ generates a document using AI. Each document type serves a different purpose.
documents.type_quote_desc: Treatment proposals with pricing. Share with patients for approval via landing pages.
documents.type_clinical_note_desc: Detailed consultation notes. Used for medical records and can be printed or saved as PDF.
documents.type_prevention_desc: Preventive care plans with recommendations. Share with patients via landing pages.

landing_pages.title: Landing Pages
landing_pages.description: Create beautiful landing pages to share documents with your patients. They can view details without needing to log in.
landing_pages.hint: This is an advanced feature. You can create templates and customize them with the visual editor.

email_config.title: Email Template
email_config.description: Customize the email template used when sending documents to patients. Add your logo, colors, and contact information.
email_config.hub_note_description: Logo and brand colors are configured in Hub. The email template will use those settings automatically.

workflow.title: Complete Workflow
workflow.step3: Choose template & generate document with AI
workflow.step5: Share via landing page or send by email

complete.title: You're Ready!
complete.description: You now know the basics of TQ. Start by creating your first transcription or adding patients.
complete.support_description: Click the support icon in the top menu to contact us anytime.

resume.title: Continue Setup?
resume.description: Resume the setup assistant when ready.

mobile.desktop_only_description: This feature is available on tablet or computer
